plot: This film is a process of decompression, like deep sea divers. Sueno de un Pajaro shakes you from the start , with the intense image editing and music by Babasonicos. To me it evokes a wave...
title: Sueño de un pájaro
plot_es: This film is a process of decompression, like deep sea divers. Sueno de un Pajaro shakes you from the start , with the intense image editing and music by Babasonicos. To me it evokes a wave...
